quickstart-cli.documentation: Smithy Quick Start example weather service using the Smithy CLI.

quickstart-gradle.documentation: Smithy Quick Start example weather service using the Smithy-Gradle-Plugin.

custom-trait.documentation: Gradle project for creating a package for custom traits.

custom-trait-handwritten.documentation: Gradle project for creating a package for custom traits with handwritten trait definitions.

custom-trait-with-java-validator.documentation: Gradle project for creating a package for custom traits with custom Java validators.

filter-internal-projection.documentation: Projection that filters out internal shapes and traits.

smithy-to-openapi.documentation: Generates an OpenAPI spec from a Smithy model

shared-model-package.documentation: Gradle project to create a shared package of common Smithy models.

common-linting-configuration.documentation: Gradle project to create a package to define a common set of model validations.

custom-linter.documentation: Gradle project to create a custom, configurable model linter.

custom-validator.documentation: Gradle project to create a custom model validator.

decorators.documentation: Gradle project to create a custom  decorator for validation events.

smithy-gradle-tutorial.documentation: Tutorial project that demonstrates how to use the Smithy Gradle plugins.
